reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, appreciating its perfect weight for between seasons and its flattering fit that sits on hips. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's true jet black, while another mentions it leaves room to cover the stomach. The size receives mixed reviews, with some finding it true to fit while others say it runs a little large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Excellent fit, Super soft
items.body: I love this top. The color is vibrant and exactly as pictured. The fit is great, not too tight or too loose. The fabric is so soft and comfortable. The length of the sleeves are great too, especially if you prefer to cover up your upper arms but not go all the way to the elbow. Nice cool summer top, not too heavy or warm. I had to purchase the pink also because it was too good a top to just have one color. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Katie Driver

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, true to size, great value!
items.body: I love this sweater! I have it in several colors and none have disappointed. The fine knit fabric is dressier than a t shirt, but it looks great with jeans. The cap sleeves are flattering and fit well under a jacket. The color is saturated and very pretty. The sweater is true to size and a little loose -- very comfortable and flattering. It is a great value for the money! Read more
items.author: Aleta

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Sweater
items.body: The sweater is light weight and perfect for not so cold Fall days. i live in the desert and this sweater is perfect for evening as the temps drop. The length is a little long, but you can fold the bottom up. I will buy another color. I usually wear a Medium, but purchased a Small and the small fit perfect. Read more
items.author: Xena702

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and Flattering
items.body: Love this short sleeve sweater! The fabric is soft, lightweight, and perfect for any season. It fits beautifully and can be dressed up or down. I liked it so much I bought it in more colors! Read more
items.author: K. Deboe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful love it
items.body: The color is exactly as shown. The fit is very flattering. Sits on the hips and blouses a little. The arms are not tight-they feel really good. The fabric is soft. I suspect if not careful when washing it could pull-but my advice is to either hand wash or was on delicate and air dry. Read more
items.author: KathyL

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tee shirt material
items.body: I wasn't a fan of the fit. It was more of a tee than a sweater. Read more
items.author: Nicole M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price.
items.body: This shirt is very flattering and is of good quality. It is comfortable, but dressy enough for work or church. Read more
items.author: Rory

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable short sleeve sweater top
items.body: Cute and comfortable top. Runs large. No tag so it can be difficult to figure out which is the front. Read more
items.author: A shor

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Orange, Khaki, Pink, White, Yellow, Royal Blue, Light Pink, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
